value:
I don't know how Kaden makes an
outfit like this look comfortable.
What's his secret?

Drawing omikuji's a New Year's
tradition, I hear. My fortune's gonna
be great—you'll see.

I wanna get Velouria a New Year's
gift she'll really like. Any ideas?

Mochi's delicious, but make sure you
chew it right. Seriously, you can
choke if you're not careful.

What, my tail? Yeah, look at it go.
Guess there's no use in trying to
hide that I'm enjoying the party.

Hey, how'd I get here? Just a minute
ago I was celebrating the new year
with $Nf.
Oh yeah! I'm in top form this year!

Nothing like a good hunt to kick off
the new year.
Ugh... It's like a bad dream...
A New Year's gift? For me?!

I'm Keaton, and I'm itching for
the first fight of the new year!
When do we get going?

Enjoying the New Year's festivities?
I've gotta admit, I'm having a great
time, $Nu.$k$pSure, I was leery at first...especially
about the uncomfortable clothes.
Thought this'd be pretty tedious.$k$pBut the kites and the hagoita are
pretty fun. And the osechi—oh, yeah!
Talk about delicious!$k$pMore than that, though, it's great just
to see everybody enjoy themselves.
The energy rubs off, y'know?$k$pVelouria seems to feel the same way.
She actually likes the weird clothes
too. Go figure.$k$pAnyway, what I'm saying is I'm happy
to celebrate New Year's any day. You
can even put me in a silly outfit for it!
せやっ
ガルルッ
ぎゃっ
やったな！
Fresh meat!
A gift from me to you!
First hunt of the year!
New year, new Keaton!
This isn't my year…
へへ…
Ugh, I'm not used to this outfit... How am I supposed to hunt like this?
If you wanna brush my fur, I won't stop you...
What do people do during the New Year? I'm not too familiar with Hoshidan customs.
I know that mochi tastes better fresh, but if there's any that's moldy, I can add it to my collection.
Check this kite out! It's broken in all the right places. Truly a work of art.
Don't tell her, but I scrounged up the perfect New Year's gift for Velouria. Hehe!
I'll be loyal and stay by your side all year if that's what you want, but only if you ask extra nicely!
I got ya.
Which way?
Here we go!
